key.name: notifications
key.description: Show notifications when feeds you're subscribed to are updated

key.name: start-refresh
key.description: Refresh feeds when lightread is started

key.name: refresh-every
key.description: Automatically refresh every specified ammount of minutes. If value 0 is set, automatic refresh is turned off

key.name: unread-cache
key.description: Keep unread items for specified ammount of days. If value 0 is set, cache is turned off. Value of -1 makes lightread to cache forever

key.name: starred-cache
key.description: Keep starred items for specified ammount of days. If value 0 is set, cache is turned off. Value of -1 makes lightread to cache forever

key.name: read-cache
key.description: Keep read items for specified ammount of days. If value 0 is set, cache is turned off. Value of -1 makes lightread to cache forever
